paper_metadata.title: Impact of Trade Integration on Poverty Reduction in ECOWAS

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: This paper examines the impact of trade integration on poverty reduction in the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: This study examines panel data for the 15 member countries of ECOWAS... The panel data cover ten years, from 2010 to 2019

evidence_citations.country_citation: This study examines panel data for the 15 member countries of ECOWAS, namely Benin, Burkina Faso, Cabo Verde, Cote d'Ivoire, Gambia, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Liberia, Mali, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, and Togo
